original: intros. split. - intros Hs. apply alwI. auto. intros s' p' H. apply aft_bnd with (P := fun=> True). auto. intros p Hp. apply H. - intros Hs. apply alwA. auto. intros scs' s' p' H. apply aftI with (V := mkWorld ProtocolWithIndInv). reflexivity. apply alw_safe'. auto.
